Timothy Howard

Melbourne, VIC Australia | timothyhoward@outlook.com

Resumé

A hard-working, quick-learning, motivated individual who blends academic training in International Relations and Islamic Studies with hands-on experience in a range of employment, including customer service, data entry and accounts reconciliation, offering employers a track record of delivering on tasks accurately, efficiently, and quickly. A capable problem solver and a meticulious worker, who will deliver a dependable result, on time, whatever the task.

Contact me

Administrative support duties as part of an accounting and reconciliation project.

Customer Service Representative (Supervisor)Jul 2013 — Present


Providing customer service and sales for Ticketek Australia, at a range of major events across the Greater Melbourne region.

  • Supervising a shift of five or more workers on a regular basis;
  • Responsible for the handling of cash, alongside the reconciling all cash at the conclusion of a shift;
  • Providing sales support and customer service in the box office on event day;
  • Opening, setting up, and closing the box office before, during, and at the conclusion of a shift.

Providing customer service and sales for NSW TrainLink (formerly CountryLink) services, within the Melbourne CBD.

  • Providing sales support and customer service at a major Melbourne CBD train station;
  • Opening, setting up, and closing the ticket office.

Organising an advertising strategy for The Age newspaper at major events across Greater Melbourne. Included setting up signboards, and organising a team to hand out complementary copies of the newspaper to patrons.
